Class AppointmentController

      public static Appointment appointment

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentController

      public AppointmentController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializing the controller and populating contacts, types, customers, appointment times, and user IDs in their respective combo boxes.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - is used for the path/location.
      resourceBundle - is used to store texts and data that are locale sensitive.

    • clearAllFields

      public void clearAllFields()
      Clears all fields; combo boxes, text fields and date pickers.

    • onAddAppointmentBtn

      public void onAddAppointmentBtn() throws NumberFormatException, DateTimeException, NullPointerException
      When the add appointment button is pressed, there is a check to make sure that there are no empty fields, there are no overlapping appointments, and the appointment being scheduled is within business hours. There is also some time conversion taking place.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException
      DateTimeException
      NullPointerException

    • onClearAppointmentBtn

      public void onClearAppointmentBtn()
      When the clear button is pressed it clears all the input from the text fields and combo boxes.

    • onModifyAppointmentBtn

      public void onModifyAppointmentBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the modify button is pressed it sends the information of the selected appointment to modify controller. If no appointment was selected to modify there will be an error displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - performs an action for the stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue with the path.

    • onWeeklyAppointmentRadioBtn

      public void onWeeklyAppointmentRadioBtn()
      When the weekly button is pressed the application will only show appointments with the current week and disables the other buttons.

    • onMonthlyAppointmentRadioBtn

      public void onMonthlyAppointmentRadioBtn()
      When the monthly button is pressed the application will only show appointments with the current month and disables the other buttons.

    • onAllAppointmentRadioBtn

      public void onAllAppointmentRadioBtn()
      When the all button is pressed the application will show all appointments on the table view.

    • onDeleteAppointmentBtn

      public void onDeleteAppointmentBtn()
      When the cancel button is pressed, there will be a message that lets the user know that they are about to cancel an existing appointment when a given appointment ID and type. Then it will cancel the appointment and delete it from the table. If no appointment is selected there will be an error message for the user to select an appointment to cancel.

    • onBackModifyAppointmentBtn

      public void onBackModifyAppointmentBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Displays a message confirming that the user would like to exit the current screen and go back to the main screen. If the user confirms they will be taken to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - performs an action for the stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue with the path.

    • RadioToggleGroup

      public void RadioToggleGroup()
      Appointment toggle for the appointment radio buttons.
